UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structural and Antimicrobial Features of Peptides Related to Myticin C, a Special Defense Molecule from the Mediterranean Mussel Mytilus galloprovincialis.
Literature.Author: Domeneghetti S, Franzoi M, Damiano N, Norante R, El Halfawy NM, Mammi S, Marin O, Bellanda M, Venier P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=>64µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=64µM),Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 16404(MIC=>64µM),Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 16404(MFC=>64µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=16µM)
